commit message:
Add real time filter color and dim indicators

The moon icons of the color, intensity and dim seekbars now change color
real time based on their values to indicate their values.
Add source files of the icons
Add text indictators of the slider positions

Update support library versions

fixes #1

There was a bug in version 23.2.0 which affected pre Lollipop devices,
making them crash on the UI load. The new 23.2.1 version of the
libraries fixes this bug.

See: https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=201817
